game.name: Sprout Lands
game.shortDescription: 새싹 땅은 동화 세계의 녹색 넓은 구역을 탐구하고 원수와 함정으로 가득 미로를 극복하여 도난 수확을 반환하려고해야하는 흥미로운 플랫 포머입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Sprout lands - Explore the green expanses of a fairy tale world in this platform game with the main character trying to harvest his crops from the beds that have been stolen!

reviewHighlights.text: A very cozy, sweet 2D platformer. The game's levels are randomly generated, making it less predictable, and I'd also like to point out the low price.
Sprout Lands is an exciting platformer in which you have to explore the green expanses of a fabulous world and try to recover stolen crops by overcomi...
